title: California Counties Takes Oil Companies to Court (Audio)
itunes:title: California Counties Takes Oil Companies to Court (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Brandon Barnes, a senior litigation analyst for Bloomberg Intelligence, discusses why two California counties are suing major oil companies. He speaks with June Grasso on Bloomberg Radio’s “Bloomberg Law”.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
